text:

It’s been called the “Sexiest Job of the 21st Century” by Harvard Business Review. The role of the Data Scientist is becoming an increasingly coveted one in the tech industry.
These savvy masters of machine learning, cluster analysis, data mining, and visualization give businesses the information they need to navigate the increasingly complex global landscape, and as such they’re able to command pretty impressive salaries. Just check out GlassDoor’s reporting .
So how do you become a Data Scientist? Here are all the tools you need to get started:
1. Exploit Python’s power 
Python’s flexibility helps Data Scientists deal with massive amounts of data to help companies make crucial decisions. Certs-School currently has an online Python course specifically geared toward aspiring Data Scientists.
Buy now: get full access for $49 , or 90% off.
2. Ratchet up your R Programming game 
While Python is a Data Scientist’s best friend, they wouldn’t get far without R. It’s a robust programming language designed to handle the most complicated data problems in existence.
R Programming can be a bit overwhelming to learn, but the Complete Introduction to R Programming bundle takes students from complete noobery to R-rated master without skipping any steps.
Buy now: all 8 courses for $49 , or 91% off.
3. Become a Data Visualizations expert with Tableau 
There are many tools that Data Scientists can use to visualize data for their own use and for presentation to businesses. However, Tableau is rapidly becoming the industry standard. The Data Visualization with Tableau Desktop 9 bundle will teach you how to create profession-tier visualizations in no time flat.
Buy now: 3 courses for $21 , or 91% off.
4. Learn to master Big Data 
Now we get to the heart of the matter. Big Data is more than a buzzword these days; it’s an area of business that intimidates corporations and programmers alike. Not so for the Data Scientist, however. His ability to scry out useful meaning from data sets that overwhelm others is precisely what makes him such an asset.
The Big Data Bundle is a collection of 9 popular courses that aim to teach you how to approach, manage, and interpret Big Data using all the tools at your disposal.
Buy now: all 9 courses for $45 , or 93% off.
5. Double down on Analytics 
Once you’re able to crunch Big Data like so much breakfast cereal, you’ll still need to be able to analyze your results. The Ultimate Data and Analytics bundle teaches you how to uncover hidden patterns, correlations, and trends letting you anticipate things that catch others by surprise.
Buy now: lifetime access for $39 , or 97% off.
